Container.Name: NadekoBotV6
Container.Overview:
Based on the offical image created for the v6 version of nadeko bot.
All your DB files and Creds needs to be in the root of the "Nadeko" folder if migrating from older version make sure you are on 5.3.9 or it will fail. I had issues starting with other files present in the folder so it's probably best to not import anything else

Config.Name: Discord Bot Token Token
Config.Description: info on how to get this https://docs.nadeko.bot/guides/docker-guide/#__tabbed_1_1
